titleStmt.title: Whereas a book entitutled, Musæum Regalis Societatis being not only a perfect catalogue of all the rarities ... belonging to the Royal Society and preserved at Gresham Colledge... it is therefore proposed by the author, Doctor Nehemiah Grew, that whoever subscribeth ...
titleStmt.author: Grew, Nehemiah, 1641-1712.

notesStmt.note: Title information from first page of text.
